cast.name: 克里斯·辛普曼 Chris Cimperman
格兰特·舒马赫 Grant Schumacher
詹姆斯·里德尔 James Liddell

writer.name: 布鲁斯·温普尔 Bruce Wemple

director.name: 布鲁斯·温普尔 Bruce Wemple

introduction: After a mysterious accident at a research camp on the Isle of Gran Manan, a CEO hires a team of blue-collar mercenaries to extract his daughter, a scientist working at the camp. Upon arrival, the team soon learns that not only is the island surrounded by a wormhole that causes time to reset every three days, but it's also crawling with hideous monsters. As they learn more about the nature of time, space, and the creatures on the island, they quickly realize that death may be the easiest way to escape the island.
